scopecontent.p: This collection contains files and correspondence of Carltheo Zeitschel, counselor of legation (Legationsrat) at the German Embassy, in charge of Jewish affairs in connection with the Sipo-SD France in Paris. It also contains is correspondence with Theodor Dannecker, head of the Jewish Affairs department within the Sipo-SD in Paris. It also includes verbal notes, certificates, telegrams, circulars, lists, notes prepared for Otto Abetz, extracts from the Journal Officiel de la République française, reports, resumes, brochures, minutes, as well as individual files. Most of the correspondence dates from the years 1941 and 1942 and deals with the persecution of Jews in France. It contains a large number of copies and translations.
